meanings: (좋다) nice, good, fine, all right, okay, (S) OK, (안전하다) safe, secure
(무방하다, 지장 없다) all right, okay, (S) OK

examples.korean: My line of work pays pretty well. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 일하는 분야는 수입이 꽤 괜찮다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My line of work pays pretty well. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This is as good a place as any to spend the night. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이곳은 밤을 보내기에 어느 곳 못지않게 괜찮다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This is as good a place as any to spend the night. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It’s all right to borrow money occasionally, but don’t let it become a habit. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 어쩌다 한 번씩 돈을 빌리는 것은 괜찮다. 하지만 그것이 버릇이 되지는 않도록 하라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s all right to borrow money occasionally, but don’t let it become a habit. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He makes a decent income. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 수입은 꽤 괜찮다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: He makes a decent income. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Wagner's music is better than it sounds. (Edgar Wilson Nye) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 바그너의 음악은 듣기보단 괜찮다. (에드가 윌슨 나이, 음악명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Wagner's music is better than it sounds. (Edgar Wilson Nye) Add to Wordbook
